song.title: Somerie
song.info:
"Somerie" song copyright (c) 1994 Chuck Biscuits / Heretics (all rights reserved) finished: 30th June, 1994 tune length: 3 mins 4 sec --------------------------- (creation time: 5:30 hours) This song written for REM Inc.'s "Damage" Musicdisk July edition. The deadline is tomorrow (July 1st), so I'm kinda in a hurry to finish this song up, and considering I really only started this song yesterday I'm quite happy with it.
Special thanks to Ryan/REN for the Layered Strings and Overture samples (Korg X3) quick greets to Nemesis, Necros, ShadowHunter, Rimbo, Maelcum, Diablo, all the other EGG crew, and all the others I've had the pleasure to meet <g>. -buckchee 77
